name: Mennen
copy: You interest me - 'cause... I like SMOOTH Men WHO KEEPS PRESENTABLE LONGER

name: Carry her heart away with fragrance by Coty
copy: Carry her heart away with fragrance by Coty. These classic Coty fragrances L'Aimant, L'Origan, Emeraude, and Paris -have inspired a series of smart gift sets, ranging from $55 to $2.25.

vision.description: A vintage-style perfume advertisement featuring a couple in a sleigh among illustrated boxes of perfume.

unique_id: Carry her heart away with fragrance by Coty_1944_1944-coty.png

name: Emeraude the Jewel Fragrance
copy: Most hauntingly mysterious of jewels is the emerald... whose subtle green fire inspired Emeraude. Let this glow-ing perfume scent your day... in Emeraude Accessories.

vision.description: The advertisement features a woman in an elegant green gown posed next to several perfume bottles, emphasizing a luxurious and sophisticated theme.

name: Fragrance
copy: If you have once spent a season in London, you will, forever after, remember that brilliant pageant the beautiful women, the jewels, and the perfumes. And in this very set-ting, Yardley's Fragrance made its debut, a modern, intriguing perfume for the formal evening scene. Pleased with its London success, we brought it to America... and American women have loved it too. There's also a face powder, Fragrance, as perfect as the perfume. We make it in six shades, including our own ex-clusive English Peach, a new rachel with a warm glow, and put it in a green and silver box that enraptures our eyes anew every day. Then, for confirmed sybarites, we hasten to add that bath salts, dust-ing powder, rouge, tale and a com pact in the Fragrance odour are also among those present.

vision.description: A vintage-style perfume advertisement featuring an elegantly dressed woman in a glamorous setting, surrounded by people at an upscale social gathering.

name: Bouquet Lentheric
copy: BOUQUET LENTHERIC the daytime fragrance. Lenthérie Bouquet with MIRACLE Scent In all fragrances, including: Shanghai, Number Twelve, Tahitian Gardenia, As Phodèle, Golden Lotus, Carnation. Bottles, from $1.00. Decanters, from $1.75.

vision.description: A vintage-style advertisement with elegant perfume bottles and floral decorations.
